name: PuppetShow: The Price of Immortality Collector's Edition
name_original: PuppetShow: The Price of Immortality Collector's Edition
description:
PuppetShow: The Price of Immortality Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by ERS Game Studios. It was originally released in 2015. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play PuppetShow: The Price of Immortality Collector's Edition on PC.
